original_title: Sri Lanka parliamentary committee appointed on twin maritime disasters
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has appointed a 14-member special parliamentary committee to inquire into the X-Press Pearl and New Diamond maritime disasters and make recommendations.

Meanwhile, the cabinet of ministers has reportedly approved a proposal to appoint a team led by the Attorney General to reach a settlement on a claim filed in Singapore to secure compensation for the X-Press Pearl incident, Sri Lanka’s worst ever maritime disaster. (Colombo/Jun06/2023)
